channel.title: RNA on Tianyi@Oxford
channel.description: Recent content in RNA on Tianyi@Oxford

item.title: Antibiotics and Protein Synthesis
item.description: Explain how antibiotics and genetic mutations have helped in our understanding of the mechanism of protein synthesis on the ribosome.

item.title: RNA Splicing
item.description: What are the roles of small nuclear RNAs (SnRNAs) in pre-mRNA splicing and what are the mechanisms that control alternative splicing?
